channel.title: Duping problem!
channel.description:
Hello, I've got a problem with duping in my server:/.
Example - Player A trades Player B. Player B offers an Item. Player A and Player B accept. Player A clicks on the mini map. Player A and Player B both have the traded Item.
I need to know how too make it so, while in trade, you can't move?:/.
Urgent help needed please! PLEAASE!

item.title: Duping problem!
item.dc:creator: @saw4 saw4
item.description:
@saw4 wrote:

Hello, I’ve got a problem with duping in my server:/.

Example -
Player A trades Player B.
Player B offers an Item.
Player A and Player B accept.
Player A clicks on the mini map.
Player A and Player B both have the traded Item.

I need to know how too make it so, while in trade, you can’t move?:/.

PLEAASE!
